main_definition: A common female name or an idiom referring to a person who is considered attractive, trendy, but also materialistic.

meanings_and_examples.example: My friend Ashley just graduated from college.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A slang term referring to a person who is attractive, trendy but also materialistic or concerned with superficial things
meanings_and_examples.example: He's so into his new iPhone that he might be considered an Ashley in our social circle.
